entry.title: CSS Tricks for IE6,IE7,IE8,IE9
entry.content:
As web developer, we usually to fix the style for special version of IE. Here are the newest CSS tricks for IE6, IE7, IE8, IE9. This is very helpful for you.

#ie-tricks{

    /* All browsers */
    color:red;

    /* All browsers but IE6 */
    color:red !important;

    /* Only works in IE6 */
    _color:red;

    /* IE6, IE7 */ 
    *color:red; 

    /* Only works in IE7*/
    +color:red;

    /* Only works in IE7 */
    *+color:red;

    /* IE6, IE7, IE8, IE9 */ 
    color:red\9;

    /* IE8, IE9 */ 
    color:red\0; 

    /*Only works in IE9*/
    color:red\9\0;

}
